model

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller class that communicates the view and the model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      This is the constructor of the Controller class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        This is the constructor of the Controller class. It initializes the communication with the Wetland Information System.

    • Method Detail

      • registerWetland

        public java.lang.String registerWetland(java.lang.String name,
                                        boolean isInUrbanArea,
                                        boolean isPublic,
                                        boolean isProtected,
                                        double km2,
                                        java.lang.String locationName,
                                        java.lang.String photoUrl)
        This method creates a new Wetland and sends it to the Wetland Information System.
        Parameters:
        name - String, the name of the wetland.
        isInUrbanArea - boolean, whether the wetland is in an urban area.
        isPublic - boolean, whether the wetland is public.
        isProtected - boolean, whether the wetland is protected.
        km2 - double, the area of the wetland in km2.
        locationName - String, the name of the location where the wetland is located.
        photoUrl - String, the url of the photo of the wetland.
        Returns:
        message String, message that informs the user if the wetland was registered or not.

      • registerSpecies

        public java.lang.String registerSpecies(java.lang.String wetlandName,
                                        java.lang.String speciesName,
                                        java.lang.String scientificName,
                                        int type,
                                        boolean isMigratory)
        This method creates a new Species and sends it to the Wetland Information System.
        Parameters:
        wetlandName - String, the name of the wetland where the species is located.
        speciesName - String, the name of the species.
        scientificName - String, the scientific name of the species.
        type - int, the type of the species.
        isMigratory - boolean, whether the species is migratory.
        Returns:
        message String, message that informs the user if the species was registered or not.

      • registerEvent

        public java.lang.String registerEvent(java.lang.String wetlandName,
                                      java.lang.String eventId,
                                      java.lang.String eventDate,
                                      int type,
                                      java.lang.String eventOrganizer,
                                      double value,
                                      java.lang.String description)
        This method creates a new Event and sends it to the Wetland Information System.
        Parameters:
        wetlandName - String, the name of the wetland where was carried out.
        eventId - String, the id of the event.
        type - int, the type of the event.
        eventOrganizer - String, the name of the event organizer.
        value - double, the value of the event.
        description - String, the description of the event.
        Returns:
        message String, message that informs the user if the event was registered or not.

      • maintenancesNumberIn

        public java.lang.String maintenancesNumberIn(int year)
        This method sends the year entered by the user to the Wetland Information System.
        Parameters:
        year - int, the year entered by the user.
        Returns:
        information String, the response from the Wetland Information System.

      • showWetlandLeastFlora

        public java.lang.String showWetlandLeastFlora()
        This method calls the method of the Wetland Information System to get the name of the wetland with least flora.
        Returns:
        wetlandName String, the name of the wetland with least number of flora.

      • wetlandsThatHave

        public java.lang.String wetlandsThatHave(java.lang.String speciesName)
        This method sends the name of the species entered by the user to the Wetland Information System.
        Parameters:
        speciesName - String, the name of the species entered by the user.
        Returns:
        wetlandsName String, the name of the wetlands that have the species entered by the user.

      • showWetlandsInfo

        public java.lang.String showWetlandsInfo()
        This method calls the method of the Wetland Information System to get the wetlands information.
        Returns:
        information String, the information of the wetlands.

      • showWetlandMostAnimals

        public java.lang.String showWetlandMostAnimals()
        This method calls the method of the Wetland Information System to get the name of the wetland with largest number of animals.
        Returns:
        wetlandName String, the name of the wetland with largest number of animals.
